title: Molten salt electrolysis: promising technology to capture and transform CO2 into valuable carbon materials
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00819G, Review Article
Yaping Deng, Zhiqiang Qiao, Nana Li, Jing Zhang, Yue Hu, Deqiang Ji, Debin Ji, Zhida Li, Hongjun Wu
The escalating concentration of atmospheric CO2, now exceeding 423.68 ppm and representing a 50% increase since pre-industrial times, underscores an urgent imperative to curb emissions.
